articles.author: Min Joo Kim, Simon Denyer
articles.title: North Korea's Kim threatens to resume nuclear, long-range missile tests
articles.description: Kim Jong Un threatens to unveil a "new strategic weapon" and says his country no longer feels bound by a moratorium on nuclear and ICBM tests.
articles.content:
It had also shipped advanced military equipment to South Korea and imposed new sanctions on the North, he said, complaining of a hostile policy and gangster-like acts.
He stressed that under such condition, there is no ground for us to get unilaterally bound… [+3847 chars]

articles.author: Kim Tong-Hyung | AP
articles.title: Kim vows to show new N. Korean weapon, never trade security
articles.description: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un has accused the Trump administration of dragging its feet in nuclear negotiations and warned that his country will soon show to the world a new strategic weapon
articles.content: Kims comments during a plenary meeting of the Workers Partys Central Committee follow a monthslong standoff between Washington and Pyongyang over disagreements involving disarmament steps and the removal of sanctions imposed on North Korea, which dimmed hopes… [+4940 chars]

articles.title: Protesters attack US Embassy in Baghdad after airstrikes
articles.description: The protesters who broke into the U.S. Embassy compound in Baghdad have retreated and set up several tents outside where they intended to stage a sit-in
articles.content:
American guards fired tear gas, and palls of smoke rose over the embassy grounds.

articles.author: Robert Burns and Ellen Knickmeyer | AP
articles.title: Attack on US Embassy in Iraq shows stark choices for Trump
articles.description: The attack on the U.S. Embassy compound in Baghdad by Iran-supported militiamen shows that President Donald Trump's "maximum pressure" campaign against Iran has not crippled its ability to strike at American interests
articles.content:
They will pay a very BIG PRICE! This is not a Warning, it is a Threat. Happy New Year! Trump tweeted later in the afternoon. He also thanked top Iraqi government leaders for their rapid response upon request.

articles.title: Kentucky sends Bud Foster and Va. Tech out with painful Belk Bowl loss - The Washington Post
articles.description: Hokies longtime defensive coordinator exits after 37-30 loss that includes a game-winning drive that consumes more than eight minutes of the fourth quarter.
articles.content: Even given the wonder, which came in a quarterback bowl-record 233 rushing yards of great Kentucky athlete Lynn Bowden Jr., how on gnarled green earth could football see fit to fete Foster with an opponents 18-play, 85-yard drive that consumed more than eight… [+6487 chars]

articles.author: John Hudson
articles.title: Turmoil in Iraq comes amid shrunken U.S. diplomatic footprint
articles.description: The Trump administration's maximum pressure campaign against Iran has come at a cost: The ability to keep a full diplomatic presence in Iraq.
articles.content: For years, Iraq has been caught in a battle for influence between its two principal backers, the United States and Iran. The United States has steadily drawn down militarily following the 2003 invasion of Iraq but hoped to retain influence in the country thro… [+5425 chars]
